content: charisma beanie pattern by alyson mccloy the mitten hooker supplies loops & threads charisma yarn 93 yards uses only one skein size j 6 mm hook tapestry needle abbreviations chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet hdc2tog half_double_crochet decrease double_crochet double_crochet decrease double_crochet decrease blo back loops only gauge 5 x 5 square is 12 stitches wide by 6 row alternating half_double_crochet & double_crochet tall special notes starting chain of each row/round does not count as st start row in same space as chain band row 1 chain 7 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet to end chain 1 turn 6 single_crochet row 2-46 single_crochet in blo chain 1 turn 6 fold band in half and join with slip_stitch flip band inside out so the slip stiches are on the inside of the band crown round 1 chain 1 half_double_crochet 48 evenly around band join with slip_stitch to first half_double_crochet 48 round 2 chain 2 double_crochet in 3rd loop around join 48 round 3 chain 1 half_double_crochet around join 48 round 4 chain 2 double_crochet around join 48 round 5 chain 1 half_double_crochet around join 48 round 6 chain 2 double_crochet around join 48 round 7 chain 1 half_double_crochet around join 48 round 8 chain 2 *double_crochet in next 4 st decrease * repeat around join 40 round 9 chain 1 *half_double_crochet in next 3 st hdc2tog * repeat around join 32 round 10 chain 2 *double_crochet in next 2 st decrease * repeat around join 24 round 11 chain 1 *half_double_crochet in next st hdc2tog * repeat around join 16 round 12 chain 1 hdc2tog around join fasten_off leaving long tail 8 use tail to cinch top of hat shut and weave in ends please email me with any questions regarding the pattern themittenhooker@gmail com feel free to sell these but please link back to my pattern or etsy shop www themittenhooker etsy com follow me on instagram for pattern releases and more and leave a hashtag if you make something from one of my patterns @themittenhooker #themittenhooker #charismabeanie
